lines.gurmukhi: jYsy pwNco qq ibKY bsuDw nvn mn qw mY n auqpq huie smwq sB qwhI mY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Paancho Tat Bikhai Basudhaa Navan Mana , Taa Mai N Outapat Hui Samaat Sabh Taahee Mai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as Earth is most humble out of the five elements. That is why it produces so much and all that goes back to it.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy pwNco AwNgurI mY sUKm knuMgRIAw hY kMcn Kcq ng soBq hY vwhI mY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Paancho Aanguree Mai Sookham Kanoungreeaa Hai , Kanchan Khachat Nag Sobhat Hai Vaahee Mai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as the little finger of the hand is smallest and frail looking, yet a diamond ring is worn in it.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy nIc jon gnIAq Aiq mwKI kiRm hIr cIr mDu aupjq suK jwhI mY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Neech Jon Ganeeat Ati Maakhee Krima , Heer Cheer Madhu Oupajat Soukh Jaahee Mai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as fly and other insects are counted among the low species, yet some of them produce such valuable things like silk, pearls, honey etc;

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy rivdws nwmw ibdr kbIr Bey hIn jwq aUc pd pwey sB kwhI mY ]632]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Ravidaas Naamaa Bidar Kabeer Bhaay , Heen Jaat Ooch Pad Paaay Sabh Kaahee Mai ?632?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly, saints like Bhagat Kabir, Namdev Ji, Bidar and Ravi Das Ji being low born have attained a much higher spiritual level who have blessed humanity with their precept that have made their life peaceful and comfortable.
